title: Leader or Laggard? Reviewing Sweden's climate and sustainability agenda
arranger: Uppsala universitet, Centrum för hållbar utveckling (CEMUS) vid Uppsala universitet och SLU
description: What does a nation such as Sweden need to deliver if it is to make its fair contribution to the Paris agreement on climate change? And how are we doing so far? Are there tradeoffs between adressing climate change and other sustainable development goals? And what  synnergies can be created?
